tagsSchema.describes: Any strings which annotate this resource. It intends to provide discovery hints.

itemTypeSchema.describes: Type of an item. Schema or an information document.

itemStatusSchema.describes: Status of an item. In production version of catalogue, for purposes of provenance, one can choose to not delete an item but set its status to 'deprecated'. All the older versions of an updated item may be persisted by setting their status as 'deprecated'. Only the current item containing latest updates should have status set to 'active'.

describes.describes: Describes the contents of item to which link is being provided

itemId.describes: Contains 'id' of the item being referred to. 'id' is of type UUID

itemURL.describes: Contains URL link for the item being referred to.
